reviews.review_msg: For some reason this semester she was very disorganized. She did not send us problem sets or readings when she said she would. We were scheduled to present in class but class will be cancelled (this happened 3 times!). When she actually did teach is was good and she is a good instructor. Maybe something is going on in her life?
Tends to ramble and then realize she is rambling and then suddenly stop rambling and continue to write on the overhead.

I feel bad for the people who took him in lower division classes, I cant see this being his thing at all. As for 403, this is DEFINITELY his interest area. Tons of knowledge and understanding, and makes things make sense, textbook theory he is not so keen on  but once he starts talking about something hes interested in...phenomenal!
Awesome prof. Top academic, too. Pleasure to be in his class.
His lectures are very inersting and obviously he knows what he is doing in the class. If u want to get a job in government office, his course is a must.

A brilliant professor! His depth of knowledge and high interest on the subject is evident in the breadth of topics covered in class. Although lectures can be a bit dry, a class with Harris is a must if knowledge is what you seek.
Very smart teacher! Yet, don't know how to teach and expect you to know things that ain't taught.
